data.eml:eml: A new species of Leposternon Wagler, 1824 (Squamata, Amphisbaenia) from northeastern Argentina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribeiro, Siria, Santos-Jr, Alfredo P., Zaher, Hussam (2015): A new species of Leposternon Wagler, 1824 (Squamata, Amphisbaenia) from northeastern Argentina. Zootaxa 4034 (2): 309-324, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4034.2.4
